SummaryEnglish: The story follows Nanami, a girl who finds herself homeless after her father leaves. One day she comes across a strange man who offers to let her have his old house - only to discover it is a Shinto shrine. Not only that, but he was actually a deity who secretly transferred his powers to her! Nanami now finds herself as a Land God with a whole new set of responsibilities ahead.

1.SummaryEnglish: Nanami revels in her memory of her kiss with Tomoe, but then quickly reminds herself that he swore he'd never fall in love with a human. Nanami then over-hears a conversation involving Tomoe. Chaos ensues.

2.TitleEnglish: The God Goes to a Hot Spring
2.SummaryEnglish: Nanami wants to take a holiday, Tomoe agrees on a day trip. Nanami overhears a conversation between her familiars. Thusly, wanting to prove herself useful the antics unfold.

3.SummaryEnglish: A curse from Tomoe's past catches up with him; Nanami desperately seeks answers to save Tomoe.

4.SummaryEnglish: Nanami continues to hide from Tomoe and only visits him at night when she thinks he is asleep, but gets caught.

5.SummaryEnglish: Nanami returns to the past again and meets Yukiji in town.

6.SummaryEnglish: The 4th and final OVA of Kako-hen

7.SummaryEnglish: As the couple look to the future and reflect on their former adventures, Nanami tries to figure out their new living situation as her high school graduation approaches. But no matter the path they choose to walk, Tomoe and Nanami’s love will endure.

1.SummaryEnglish: Abandoned by her father, Nanami finds herself homeless when she meets a man who offers his own home to her. His home turns out to be a shrine where his supernatural household awaits the return of their lord and master after a 20-year absence.

2.SummaryEnglish: Nanami discovers that Kurama, a famous pop star, has transferred to her high school, which spurs her to return to school. However, as a weak land god, her life may be at risk if she wanders outside the shrine alone.

3.SummaryEnglish: The land under Mikage Shrine's protection includes Isara Swamp and Himemiko, its guardian mistress, comes to pay her respects to the new land god. And Nanami's divine matchmaking powers are put to the test for the first time.

4.SummaryEnglish: Nanami saves a pretty white snake at school and for her trouble, she becomes marked as the snake's intended. Tomoe transfers into Nanami's class to protect her, but the snake comes for her anyway.

5.SummaryEnglish: Narukami, god of thunder, has always wanted Tomoe as a familiar for herself. Now that the god he serves is Nanami, a human girl, Narukami sees her chance to take away Nanami's godhood and make Tomoe hers.

6.SummaryEnglish: Nanami stays home with a cold while Tomoe goes to school disguised as her in order to keep her attendance rate from slipping. Mizuki takes advantage of Tomoe's absence to pay Nanami a visit.

7.TitleEnglish: The God Asks a Boy Out on a Date
7.SummaryEnglish: Nanami experiments a little with her divine powers while she struggles to define exactly how she feels about Tomoe. And Kurama, being the yokai who has more experience with humans, offers some words of advice to Tomoe.

8.TitleEnglish: The God Goes to the Beach
8.SummaryEnglish: Summer break is here and Nanami goes to the beach with her friends to take her mind off her broken heart. Trouble ensues when Tomoe accompanies her and goes into the ocean against his better judgment.

9.TitleEnglish: The God Goes to the Dragon King's Palace
9.SummaryEnglish: In her quest to recover the stolen Dragon King's right eye and return it to him in exchange for Tomoe's freedom, Nanami travels back in time and gets a glimpse of Tomoe's past.

10.TitleEnglish: Tomoe Becomes a Familiar / The God Goes to a Mixer
10.SummaryEnglish: Flashing back to the past, some of what Tomoe went through with Mikage is revealed. And returning to the present for the second part, Nanami gets dragged off to a mixer with her friends.

11.SummaryEnglish: Mizuki ventures into the city alone to learn the secret to making it in human society like the super popular pop star Kurama. And Nanami drags Tomoe off on a date to the amusement park.

12.SummaryEnglish: Nanami decides to hold an autumn festival at the shrine to let the locals know that it's not abandoned or haunted. But as she prepares for the festival, Otohiko comes along to throw a wrench into things.

13.TitleEnglish: I've Started the "Being a God" Thing
13.SummaryEnglish: Unable to exorcise the miasma encroaching on the shrine, Nanami believes she is useless and leaves. Finding her gone, Tomoe and Mizuki go searching for her, leaving the shrine and the miasma to Onikiri and Kotetsu.

1.TitleEnglish: I've Started the 'Being a God' Thing Again
1.SummaryEnglish: As the land god of the Mikage Shrine, Nanami is invited to the annual gathering of the gods in Izumo, but on the one condition that she must pass a test administered by Otohiko.

2.SummaryEnglish: Now that Nanami is set to go to Izumo to attend the Divine Assembly, she must decide who goes with her - Tomoe or Mizuki. And she must also face the consequences of attending a divine event as a mortal being.

3.TitleEnglish: The God Falls into the Netherworld
3.SummaryEnglish: Okuninushi, the god hosting the Divine Assembly, asks Nanami to go handle a situation happening on the border between the worlds of the living and the dead.

4.TitleEnglish: The God Races Across the Netherworld
4.SummaryEnglish: Izanami imprisons Kirihito and refuses to allow Nanami to return to the surface with him. Nanami must decide how much she believes in her own powers and what she is willing to risk to save him.

5.TitleEnglish: The God Makes Her Second Romantic Confession
5.SummaryEnglish: When Tomoe reverted to being a wild fox to save Nanami, he undid his contract as her familiar. And now, he takes this opportunity to reconsider whether he wants to go back to Nanami or not.

6.TitleEnglish: The God Meets a Little Tengu
6.SummaryEnglish: On her way home, Nanami runs into Himemiko and they spend some quality girl time together. Later, she meets a little tengu on a mission.

7.TitleEnglish: The God Goes to Mount Kurama
7.SummaryEnglish: Kurama returns to Mount Kurama with Nanami and Tomoe to take Botanmaru home and see if he can help is ailing father.

8.SummaryEnglish: Kurama's father is sick, but there is no easy way to get in to see him, so the gang must devise a way to get past Jiro's defenses.

9.SummaryEnglish: The ruse is simple. Nanami confers her godly powers to Kurama, so he can pretend to be a god, someone Jiro cannot turn away from the gates. While Kurama and Tomoe distract Jiro, Nanami sneaks in to deliver the cure.

10.TitleEnglish: The God Receives a Romantic Confession
10.SummaryEnglish: The search for the Sojobo's soul leads to an unexpected place and an unexpected confession.

11.TitleEnglish: The God Goes Back to Being a Child
11.SummaryEnglish: Kirihito, aka Akura-oh, has not given up on getting his body back from the Netherworld. But in the meantime, Nanami and her familiars go to see the Year God, to receive a talisman for the new year.

12.TitleEnglish: The God Receives a Marriage Proposal
12.SummaryEnglish: Nanami is taught by her mother to become an independent woman, since her father is a deadbeat and her mother is about to die. After viewing her childhood memories, Tomoe takes young Nanami away from Mizuki. After spending time with young Nanami while strolling around in the town, young Nanami asked Tomoe if he loves her, to which he confirms. Tomoe then proposes a marriage with her, to which she agrees. Just then, Mizuki carries Nanami out of the gate, and Tomoe is upset that Nanami is unable to remember him in her fantasy. Furthermore, Nanami does not know much about her mother, especially since all of the photos of her mother were burned in a house fire long ago. When Nanami, Tomoe and Mizuki make it to the Year God Shrine, they are reluctant to find out that it is blocked by the Lord Year God's sheep, of which its wool takes up a lot of room. Nanami calms the sheep down so that the Lord Year God can trim its wool.
